text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The candidate answer discusses GILTI inclusions, foreign tax credits (FTCs), the GILTI high-tax exception, and Subpart F, but it never explicitly states the fundamental purpose of the FTC limitation, which is to ensure that foreign taxes on one type of income cannot be used to offset U.S. tax on another type of income (i.e., the separate basket limitation).", "criterion_id": "9620eeef-a685-4f67-8c7e-caaed3794617"}
